QuestData.Title: Why Is The Brew Gone?
QuestData.Description: Commander, we have a bit of a... uh... problem.$B$BThis group o' saberon followed us from Gorgrond, and they've been stealin' our footmen's swords an' slaughtering our peasants!$B$BI hate to ask fer your time, but all of yer men are guardin' the camp from any further raids. Plus...$B$B<Quartermaster O'Riley lowers her voice to a whisper.>$B$BThey took our beer!
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve $1oa Footman Longswords and $2oa Thunderbrew Kegs.
QuestData.CompletionText: Commander! Have ye had a moment to deal with the saberon?
QuestData.RewardText: Oh thank goodness, I knew ye would come through!$B$BAt your service, as always.
